to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: An unknown number of high-resolution observation satellites would be produced by this project.
sentences.chinese: 這個計畫將會製造出不明數量的高解析度觀測衛星。

sentences.english: The E73 has a lower-resolution display than others.
sentences.chinese: 在E73擁有比別人低解析度的顯示器。

sentences.english: The fax machine allows any fax to be sent in either high or low resolution.
sentences.chinese: 這一臺傳真機可選擇傳高解析度或者低解析度。

sentences.english: The fax machine allows any fax to be sent in either high or low resolution.
sentences.chinese: 這一臺傳真機可選擇傳高解析度或者低解析度。

sentences.english: Display is 8-digit LED for increased resolution.
sentences.chinese: 顯示器是8位數字增加解析度LED。

sentences.english: We need to convert this to a higher rez for printing purposes.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要將其轉換到一個更高的解析度打印目的。

sentences.english: Explain the significance of the high-resolution crystal structure of collagen.
sentences.chinese: 請解釋膠原蛋白的高解析度晶體結構的重要性。

sentences.english: They sequenced 483 genomes at high resolution.
sentences.chinese: 他們以高解析度爲483個基因組做了基因測序。

sentences.english: DTS-HD High Resolution Audio and DTS Digital Surround are also supported.
sentences.chinese: HD高解析度音頻和DTS數字環繞也支持。

sentences.english: Double high definition coder can test the sample to be anamorphic or not.
sentences.chinese: 雙高解析度編碼器測量試樣變形。
與解析度和裝置無關的圖形。

sentences.english: The quality of the images is not of sufficiently high resolution and I would need more data.
sentences.chinese: 他們提供的圖像解析度不高，我還需要更多的資料。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
